If you are into games that you want to just pick up, play, and feel gratification for, there are better options than this (not to say that it is completely unfun when starting). If you have time to sink into a shooter, and you really like shooters, then this is a must play. Free to play, paying giving a minimal boost (fewer cheaters because you get to play with other people who payed/are trusted), and deep gameplay that will let you learn for hours and hours and hours are what characterize this game. If you don't have time or don't want to invest time, you can still find fun in it, but those who stick it out for the long haul will have one of the best experiences an fps can give.
